primary: Hey! My name is Denis Wells and I'm a Software Engineer. My day job is working with software companies. On the side, I like to do freelance work making websites for local businesses.
secondary: For fun, I work on video game development and pixel art. If you want to break the ice, ask me about my VHS collection, anything 'home-theater' or my cats.
imageLabel: Me and my distraught cat, Moon
